CustomField.formula: IF( (ISBLANK( Current_Price__c ) || ISBLANK( Current_Next_Invoice_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( Current_Renewal_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( Original_Agreement_Date__c)) || ((ISNULL( Asset__r.Current_Product_Subscription__c ) || Asset__r.Current_Product_Subscription__r.RecurSoft__Unit_Price__c = 0) && Asset__r.Accounting_Data_Request_Completed__c <= CreatedDate ) , "Needs Accounting Data" , "Complete" )
CustomField.label: Data
